overview: Culled from 3 decades of experimental film and video footage, specially enhanced with visual effects, this DVD is all you need to create a psychedelic light show experience! Combine with your own music and play on your TV or use a video projector for maximum effect. Contains 10 distinct sections with uniquely trippy visuals to create the right mood for your party, musical performance, or just chillin' out!
title: Experimental Film & Video Light Show
